altername_name: ゆるキャン△ Have a nice day!
name: Yuru Camp △ Have a nice day!
overview: Let’s camp together in a relaxed and fun way! The long-awaited game of the popular anime “Yurucamp”! Rin Shima, who likes solo camping, enjoys a quiet camp alone today. However, after a certain encounter, her camp life began to change little by little. "Rin-chan, let's camp!" Kakamigahara Nadeshiko, who became interested in camping after meeting Rin, joined the high school "Outdoor Activity Circle (Nokuru)" and became more and more fascinated by camping. This is a story that began when the two met.
